'Huge implications' for storm Sandy if it hits N.E.

Hurricane Sandy could brush by the state, miss it entirely, or slam into it directly early next week, the National Weather Service says. (Globe, 2:24 p.m.)

Trump makes $5 million offer to Obama

The developer says he will donate $5 million to the charity of President Obama's choice if he releases his college and his passport applications and records. Click the link to see the video. (Boston.com, 12:14 p.m.)

New poll: Warren leads by 5 points
